description: A jQuery plugin for creating and managing a crossword puzzle interface, including rendering the grid, handling user input, navigation, and answer checking.

methods.name: init
methods.description: Initializes the crossword puzzle, sorts data, sets event handlers, and builds the puzzle grid and clues.

methods.name: calcCoords
methods.description: Calculates all coordinates for each puzzle entry based on starting positions and orientations.

methods.name: buildTable
methods.description: Constructs the HTML table grid for the crossword puzzle based on calculated rows and columns.

methods.name: buildEntries
methods.description: Populates the grid with answer entries, adds input fields, and labels for each word.

methods.name: checkAnswer
methods.description: Checks if the current input matches the answer for the active entry and marks it as solved if correct.
